```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
## Add scvi dimensions to the seurat object
for (nm in names(m2_all_raw_mrg_list)) {
  m2_all_raw_mrg_list[[nm]][["scvi_umap"]] <- m2_all_scvi_seu[[nm]][["umap"]]
  m2_all_raw_mrg_list[[nm]][["scvi"]] <- m2_all_scvi_seu[[nm]][["scVI"]]
  m2_all_raw_mrg_list[[nm]]@meta.data[,c("_scvi_batch", "_scvi_labels", "leiden")] <- m2_all_scvi_seu[[nm]]@meta.data[,c("_scvi_batch", "_scvi_labels", "leiden")]
}
```


```{r}
m2_all_raw_mrg_list <- map(m2_all_raw_mrg_list, ~AddMetaData(.x, 
                                  .x@meta.data %>%
                                    mutate(stage = stage_fld,
                                           stage_afm = case_when(stage %in% c("Early ring", "Late ring", "Early trophozoite", "Late trophozoite", "Schizont", "Gametocyte (developing)") ~ "Asexual",
                                                               stage %in% c("Female", "Female (LE)") ~ "Female",
                                                               stage %in% c("Male", "Male (LE)") ~ "Male"),
                                           stage_ag = case_when(stage_afm %in% c("Female", "Female (LE)","Male", "Male (LE)") ~ "Gametocyte",
                                                                T ~ stage_afm)) %>%
                                    select(stage_afm, stage_ag)
                                  ))

```
